title: Something might be going on
contents:
These are the interacitons you can do in this tool:
  1. Open/Close
  2. Move and resize
  3. Make note boxes
  4. Highlighting
  5. Searching

title: What's going on? Let us know! Think Aloud!
contents:
Please try to think aloud during your analysis‚Äîprovide short verbal explanations of your actions and why. Here are some examples of verbal updates that you might give:
I'm searching for Waldo because I am curious whether he was at the beach.
or
I thought something interesting was happening with Mike in France, but I didn't find much. So now I'm looking for things related to apples.
or
I thought it was strange that Mike and Waldo both like apples, so now I'm trying to find out if they both like oranges.

title: Mind your time! Can you explain what's going on?
contents: At the end of the time, you will be asked to explain your hypotheses.

title: Be smart! Figure out what's going on!
contents:
- Use whatever features you want to help you with the investigation.
The investigation period will be up to 15 minutes. Please do the best you can to address the prompt.

title: Too many Notes to read! Use the Search!
contents: This synthetic data set is designed to be like a mix of data from different sources, such as phone records, security camera descriptions, and interviews from to suspects and the police.

title: Write a note for each group of dialogs!
contents: It is recommended that you don't start by trying to read a large number of the documents. Instead, use the ‚Äúsearch‚Äù functionality to look for specific keywords that might be related to critical information in the prompt.

title: I bet you can't finish reading all these dialogues in 15 minutes! Don't go random!
contents: Do more searches to find connections between people, places, objects, or events that look promising or suspicious.

title: Group similar dialoges on one side!
contents: Move similar documents together so you can think about them as a group

title: Final Notes!
contents:
Now you're an expert! (at least in this interface tool)
Some final notes before we get started for real:
  • üó£Ô∏è Please think out loud as you work
  • ‚è±Ô∏è You'll have 15 minutes to complete the task
  • üìù There's a short quiz at the end
  • üñ•Ô∏è Maximize your screen for the best experience
